variable.name: cl_useproxy
variable.description: This toggles whether Qizmo should be used (if detected) to a server. When enabled the server browser will use an existing connection to a Qizmo when connecting another server by using the ezQuake Server Browser.

value.description: do not use Qizmo to connect a server chosen in the Server Browser
use Qizmo to connect a server chosen in the Server Browser
